attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned would like the prime minister to award SHARON OSBOURNE an MBE, for her fight against colon cancer.her down to earth honesty and for talking about her private life so openly.for all the work she does for charity.  for being such a great entertainer through sheer hard work and determination and for being such a great inspiration to thousands of people around the world.
